47#ifndef __sockpp_connector_h
48#define __sockpp_connector_h
49
50#include "sockpp/sock_address.h"
51#include "sockpp/stream_socket.h"
52#include "sockpp/types.h"
53
54namespace sockpp {
55
57
64class connector : public stream_socket
65{
67 using base = stream_socket;
68
69 // Non-copyable
70 connector(const connector&) = delete;
71 connector& operator=(const connector&) = delete;
72
74 result<> recreate(const sock_address& addr);
75
76public:
80 connector() noexcept {}
87 connector(const sock_address& addr) {
88 if (auto res = connect(addr); !res)
89 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
90 }
97 connector(const sock_address& addr, error_code& ec) noexcept {
98 ec = connect(addr).error();
99 }
107 template <class Rep, class Period>
108 connector(const sock_address& addr, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime) {
109 if (auto res = connect(addr, microseconds(relTime)); !res)
110 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
111 }
119 template <class Rep, class Period>
120 connector(
121 const sock_address& addr, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime, error_code& ec
122 ) noexcept {
123 ec = connect(addr, microseconds(relTime)).error();
124 }
134 connector(const sock_address& addr, std::chrono::milliseconds t) {
135 if (auto res = connect(addr, t); !res)
136 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
137 }
146 connector(const sock_address& addr, milliseconds t, error_code& ec) noexcept {
147 ec = connect(addr, t).error();
148 }
154 connector(connector&& conn) noexcept : base(std::move(conn)) {}
160 connector& operator=(connector&& rhs) noexcept {
161 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
162 return *this;
163 }
171 result<> connect(const sock_address& addr);
181 result<> connect(const sock_address& addr, microseconds timeout);
192 template <class Rep, class Period>
193 result<> connect(const sock_address& addr, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime) {
194 return connect(addr, microseconds(relTime));
195 }
196};
197
199
203template <typename STREAM_SOCK, typename ADDR = typename STREAM_SOCK::addr_t>
204class connector_tmpl : public connector
205{
207 using base = connector;
208
209 // Non-copyable
210 connector_tmpl(const connector_tmpl&) = delete;
211 connector_tmpl& operator=(const connector_tmpl&) = delete;
212
213public:
215 using stream_sock_t = STREAM_SOCK;
217 using addr_t = ADDR;
218
222 connector_tmpl() noexcept {}
229 connector_tmpl(const addr_t& addr) : base(addr) {}
236 connector_tmpl(const addr_t& addr, error_code& ec) noexcept : base(addr, ec) {}
244 template <class Rep, class Period>
245 connector_tmpl(const addr_t& addr, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime)
246 : base(addr, relTime) {}
254 template <class Rep, class Period>
255 connector_tmpl(
256 const addr_t& addr, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime, error_code& ec
257 ) noexcept
258 : base(addr, relTime, ec) {}
264 connector_tmpl(connector_tmpl&& rhs) : base(std::move(rhs)) {}
270 connector_tmpl& operator=(connector_tmpl&& rhs) {
271 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
272 return *this;
273 }
278 addr_t address() const { return addr_t(base::address()); }
283 addr_t peer_address() const { return addr_t(base::peer_address()); }
291 result<> bind(const addr_t& addr) { return base::bind(addr); }
299 result<> connect(const addr_t& addr) { return base::connect(addr); }
310 template <class Rep, class Period>
311 result<> connect(
312 const sock_address& addr, const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& relTime
313 ) {
314 return base::connect(addr, std::chrono::microseconds(relTime));
315 }
327 result<> connect(const string& saddr, in_port_t port) noexcept {
328 auto addrRes = addr_t::create(saddr, port);
329 if (!addrRes)
330 return addrRes.error();
331 if (auto res = connect(addrRes.value()); !res)
332 return res;
333 return none{};
334 }
347 template <class Rep, class Period>
348 result<> connect(
349 const string& saddr, in_port_t port, const duration<Rep, Period>& relTime
350 ) noexcept {
351 auto addrRes = addr_t::create(saddr, port);
352 if (!addrRes)
353 return addrRes.error();
354 if (auto res = connect(addrRes.value(), relTime); !res)
355 return res;
356 return none{};
357 }
358};
359
361} // namespace sockpp

363#endif // __sockpp_connector_h
